duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Employee Relations support to leaders and employees, administer/interpret policies, and investigate team member concerns.
Make recommendations to promote positive employee relations and ensure consistent interpretation of policies and laws.
Maintain appropriate documentation and records for Employee Relations cases.
Deliver service in a professional and efficient manner, providing prompt assistance and managing expectations for high levels of customer satisfaction.
Conduct thorough investigations of complaints to identify and resolve concerns while reducing the risk of legal action.
Respond to situations that could impact the organization's philosophy on third-party representation and maintain timely and complete documentation of Employee Relations matters.
Establish a presence as a resource to proactively resolve concerns and monitor trends to make recommendations to HR and operational leaders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resource Management or related field (or equivalent years of related experience in a healthcare setting). HR Certification preferred.
